name: UNiagaraBaselineController
doc: Base class for baseline controllers. These can are responsible for spawning and manipulating the FX needed for the baseline perf tests.

TestDuration: Duration to gather performance stats for the given system.
EffectType: The effect type this controller is in use by.
Owner: The owning actor for this baseline controller.

methods.name: GetSystem
methods.doc: Returns the System for this baseline. Will synchronously load the system if needed.

methods.name: OnBeginTest
methods.doc: Called from the stats system when we begin gathering stats for the given System asset.

methods.name: OnEndTest
methods.doc: Called from the stats system on completion of the test with the final stats for the given system asset.

methods.name: OnOwnerTick
methods.doc: Called when the owning actor is ticked.

methods.name: OnTickTest
methods.doc: Returns whether the baseline test is complete.
